text.section: The annual statement of a reciprocal insurer shall be made and filed by its attorney.
The statement shall be supplemented by such information as may be required by the commissioner relative to the affairs and transactions of the attorney.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1380, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 27, sec. 15, effective June 18, 1970.
